alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa; Ellis; Harper; Major; Woods; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 6:49AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Ellis, Woods, Harper, southern Alfalfa, Major and Woodward Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 646 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong winds associated with dissipating showers and thunderstorms. The dissipating rain extended from near Laverne to Sharon to Taloga. Areas near and north of these locations may see southerly winds gusting to around 50 mph and temperatures rising quickly into the 80s. These strong winds are associated with heat burst activity. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodward, Fairview, Laverne, Buffalo, Helena, Mooreland, Waynoka, Ringwood, Carmen, Cleo Springs, Fort Supply, Freedom, Ames, Meno, Aline, Sharon, Dacoma, Mutual, May and Rosston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Alfalfa; Ellis; Harper; Major; Woods; Woodward
